item.title: CVE-2024-30425|2024-03-29T13:19:15.872Z -- The Beaver Builder Team -- Beaver Builder
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in The Beaver Builder Team Beaver Builder allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Beaver Builder: from n/a through 2.7.4.4.
